New Records: India and South Africa qualified for their respective first World Cup finals
India won the inaugural T20 World Cup in 2007
Key Match Events: India and South Africa advanced to the final after defeating England and Afghanistan respectively
Pre-Game Insights: The match is anticipated as a battle between two unbeaten teams
Rohit Sharma will lead India against South Africa
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados
This is the first World Cup final for both teams
